full_summary:
Average housekeeping company
==============================

### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: cb-7439-5129628

**Solicitation Number**: 2023-00963

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a reliable Janitorial Services supplier to manage all housekeeping duties for the Fallowfield Laboratory, located in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

**Business Requirement**
------------------------

This procurement is set aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) program. To be eligible, suppliers must certify that they are an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements outlined in the PSIB program. Details can be found in Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

### Details

*   **Service Location**: Fallowfield Laboratory, 3851 Fallowfield Rd, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, Canada
*   **Service Period**: From October 1, 2023, to March 31, 2027
*   **Required Services**: Provision of labour, materials, and equipment for a full range of janitorial services

### Briefing and Site Visit

*   **Site Visit**: Mandatory meeting at the Fallowfield Laboratory for all interested suppliers on July 27, 2023, at 10:00 AM EDT
*   **Note**: The supplier must maintain a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) throughout the contract period. Both the contractor and their employees must also have a valid RELIABILITY STATUS issued by Public Services and Procurement Canada and approved by the CFIA.

### Procurement Documentation

You can access tender documents via the [Government of Canada's procurement platform](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/): please download the Request for Proposal (RFP) document. Ensure you obtain an RFP copy and use it as a basis for your response.

### Important Dates

*   Proposal due date: August 21, 2023, at 15:00 EDT
*   [PDF](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/portal/pcg/downloadFile.action?fileId=14533727&fileType=doc)  of RFP

Note: You can contact Ron Staigh, RFx Services Coordinator, at (613) 558-5937 or via [ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca) for clarification questions. Please refer to the RFP document for more information. [1](*
